column4: Germany denies investigating Tesla over software updates
column5: BERLIN Germany's Transport Ministry denied a media report on Friday that it was investigating Tesla Motors Inc for updating driving assistance software without informing authorities  but said it was "clarifying technical issues" on the matter.

column4: UPDATE 2-Germany denies investigating Tesla over software updates
column5: * Tesla says fully cooperating with German authorities   (Adds further comment from Tesla  KBA watchdog  background)

column4: German ministry denies investigating Tesla over software updates
column5: BERLIN  July 8 Germany's Transport Ministry denied a report on Friday that it was investigating Tesla Motors Inc for updating driving assistance software without informing authorities  but said it was "clarifying technical issues" on the matter.

column4: Panasonic expects to double sales of electric car batteries in three years
column5: OSAKA  Japan Japan's Panasonic Corp said it expects strong demand for its lithium-ion batteries from Tesla Motors Inc to help more than double its annual sales of automobile-related batteries in three years.

column4: Panasonic expects to double sales of electric car batteries in 3 years
column5: OSAKA  Japan  July 8 Japan's Panasonic Corp  said it expects strong demand for its lithium-ion batteries from Tesla Motors Inc to help more than double its annual sales of automobile-related batteries in three years.
